reviewText: I bought this Blue-ray  with some apprehensions, given the authorship by Schoenberg. But I listened to it repeatedly and on the 4th hearing, I loved it. Somehow I got over my prejudices and I enjoyed a spare rendition of the work. Nobody I really knew  (the director did not belong there), but somehow I understood it, but you have to listen to it several times, then it hits you. An interesting experience.
